con:method.name: getBellSchedules
con:method.con:description: Bulk operation to retrieve all available BellSchedules, which define when the bells ring for the start and end of the SchedulePeriods at the given Provider.

con:parameter.con:name: fields
con:parameter.con:description: Return only specified fields `fields=name,nid`

con:parameter.con:name: page
con:parameter.con:description: Return nth page of results; default 0 `page=2`; applies to any call with repeated data

con:parameter.con:name: max
con:parameter.con:description: Maximum items per page, default 10,000; `max=100`; applies to any call with repeated data

con:parameter.con:name: unwrap
con:parameter.con:description: Remove top level wrapper from json results in single result reponses; `unwrap=1`

con:parameter.con:name: human
con:parameter.con:description: For code set fields, translate code to human readable form; `human=1`

con:parameter.con:name: sort
con:parameter.con:description: Sort results by specified field; `sort=FamilyName`

con:parameter.con:name: field
con:parameter.con:description: Field to filter on when used with **pattern**; `field=FamilyName`

con:parameter.con:name: pattern
con:parameter.con:description: Filter results using pattern on **field**; `pattern=We*`

con:parameter.con:name: Accept
con:parameter.con:description: Standard HTTP accept header, choose between JSON and XML for response. Defaults to XML if this header is missing.

con:parameter.con:name: X-Edsby-APIClientId
con:parameter.con:description:
Identifies the client making the API call to network infrastructure allowing WAFs to conduct rate limiting, gather usage statistics, etc. without having to unpack the username, subject claim or API key from the Authorization header.

Must be populated with the subject claim GUID from the access token in the Authorization header.

con:parameter.con:name: X-Edsby-OrganisationRefId
con:parameter.con:description: The Ministry of Education Organisation Id of the Provider(or other Organisation); used to limit the scope of the API endpoint to a particular MoE Organisation.

con:parameter.con:name: scheduleRefId
con:parameter.con:description: System RefId of the timetable Schedule

con:representation.con:description: successful operation
successful operation
con:representation.con:sampleContent: <object> <BellSchedules> <BellSchedule> <AnonymousModel> <BellScheduleRefId>string</BellScheduleRefId> <BellScheduleLocalId>string</BellScheduleLocalId> <BellScheduleName>string</BellScheduleName> <Organisation> <RefId>string</RefId> <Name>string</Name> <LocationNum>0</LocationNum> </Organisation> <Schedule> <RefId>string</RefId> <LocalId>string</LocalId> <Name>string</Name> </Schedule> <SchedulePeriodList> <SchedulePeriodTime> <AnonymousModel> <Period> <RefId>string</RefId> <LocalId>string</LocalId> <Name>string</Name> </Period> <StartTime>string</StartTime> <EndTime>string</EndTime> </AnonymousModel> </SchedulePeriodTime> </SchedulePeriodList> <RecordAudit> <CreatedDateTime>2015-07-20T15:49:04-07:00</CreatedDateTime> <LastUpdatedDateTime>2015-07-20T15:49:04-07:00</LastUpdatedDateTime> <DeletedDateTime>2015-07-20T15:49:04-07:00</DeletedDateTime> <CreatedBy> <RefId>string</RefId> <LocalId>string</LocalId> <Name>string</Name> </CreatedBy> <LastUpdatedBy> <RefId>string</RefId> <LocalId>string</LocalId> <Name>string</Name> </LastUpdatedBy> <DeletedBy> <RefId>string</RefId> <LocalId>string</LocalId> <Name>string</Name> </DeletedBy> <DeletedReason>LEA</DeletedReason> </RecordAudit> </AnonymousModel> </BellSchedule> </BellSchedules> </object>

con:representation.con:description: Unauthorised - Authorization header missing, or contents incorrect.
Forbidden - API client has successfully authenticated, but is not authorised to make this API call
Not Found - resource in URL not found.

Failed to retrieve object(s).

con:method.name: createBellSchedules
con:method.con:description: Bulk operation to create one or more BellSchedules, which define when the bells ring for the start and end of the SchedulePeriods at the given Provider.

con:parameter.con:name: x-http-method-override
con:parameter.con:description: Rather than CREATE records, treat this request as a SYNC request.

con:parameter.con:name: Accept
con:parameter.con:description: Standard HTTP accept header, choose between JSON and XML for response. Defaults to XML if this header is missing.

con:parameter.con:name: X-Edsby-APIClientId
con:parameter.con:description:
Identifies the client making the API call to network infrastructure allowing WAFs to conduct rate limiting, gather usage statistics, etc. without having to unpack the username, subject claim or API key from the Authorization header.

Must be populated with the subject claim GUID from the access token in the Authorization header.

con:parameter.con:name: X-Edsby-OrganisationRefId
con:parameter.con:description: The Ministry of Education Organisation Id of the Provider(or other Organisation); used to limit the scope of the API endpoint to a particular MoE Organisation.

con:parameter.con:name: scheduleRefId
con:parameter.con:description: System RefId of the timetable Schedule

con:method.name: updateBellSchedules
con:method.con:description: Bulk operation to update one or more BellSchedules, which define when the bells ring for the start and end of the SchedulePeriods at the given Provider.

con:parameter.con:name: Accept
con:parameter.con:description: Standard HTTP accept header, choose between JSON and XML for response. Defaults to XML if this header is missing.

con:parameter.con:name: X-Edsby-APIClientId
con:parameter.con:description:
Identifies the client making the API call to network infrastructure allowing WAFs to conduct rate limiting, gather usage statistics, etc. without having to unpack the username, subject claim or API key from the Authorization header.

Must be populated with the subject claim GUID from the access token in the Authorization header.

con:parameter.con:name: X-Edsby-OrganisationRefId
con:parameter.con:description: The Ministry of Education Organisation Id of the Provider(or other Organisation); used to limit the scope of the API endpoint to a particular MoE Organisation.

con:method.name: patchBellSchedules
con:method.con:description: Bulk operation to update one or more fields of one ore more BellSchedules, which define when the bells ring for the start and end of the SchedulePeriods at the given Provider.

con:parameter.con:name: Accept
con:parameter.con:description: Standard HTTP accept header, choose between JSON and XML for response. Defaults to XML if this header is missing.

con:parameter.con:name: X-Edsby-APIClientId
con:parameter.con:description:
Identifies the client making the API call to network infrastructure allowing WAFs to conduct rate limiting, gather usage statistics, etc. without having to unpack the username, subject claim or API key from the Authorization header.

Must be populated with the subject claim GUID from the access token in the Authorization header.

con:parameter.con:name: X-Edsby-OrganisationRefId
con:parameter.con:description: The Ministry of Education Organisation Id of the Provider(or other Organisation); used to limit the scope of the API endpoint to a particular MoE Organisation.

con:parameter.con:name: scheduleRefId
con:parameter.con:description: System RefId of the timetable Schedule

con:representation.con:description: Patch successful; returns patched objects
Patch successful; returns patched objects
